short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture web objects with an optimized algorithm to find unique locators.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This locator Capturing Extension is a lightweight yet powerful Chrome extension that revolutionizes the way developers and testers interact with web elements. Built with ease of use and seamless integration in mind, this tool simplifies the process of obtaining the locator and a unique key for any web element. Whether youâ€™re working on test automation, debugging, or web development, this extension saves time and effort by allowing you to instantly retrieve and manage element information.

What Does It Do?
The locator Capturing Extension provides a streamlined approach to identifying web elements on any webpage. It allows users to:

1.Capture locator Effortlessly: By simply right-clicking on any element and selecting the "Capture XPath" option from the context menu, the extension extracts the locator and a unique key for the selected element.
2.Highlight Selected Elements: As you interact with a webpage, the extension highlights the currently selected element with a clear red border. This visual feedback ensures accuracy by letting you know exactly which element is being captured.
3.Copy to Clipboard: The captured locator and unique key are automatically copied to the clipboard, making it easy to paste them into your scripts, tools, or documentation.
4.Seamless Integration with TestMagiQ: When used with TestMagiQ.com, the extension takes functionality to the next level. It automatically populates the locator and unique key fields on the TestMagiQ interface, eliminating manual steps and enabling smoother workflows for test automation.
